teaser: Airing on Thursday December 25, 2014: Ugly holiday sweaters have a renaissance ... a must-have Christmas toy still tops gift lists three decades later ... and why you can copyright music but not a recipe.
title: Marketplace for Thursday December 25, 2014
byline: Mitchell Hartman, Noel King, Grace Hood, Adrienne Hill, Tim Fitzsimons and Michell Eloy
description: Airing on Thursday December 25, 2014: Ugly holiday sweaters have a renaissance ... a must-have Christmas toy still tops gift lists three decades later ... and why you can copyright music but not a recipe.
